info.description:
=========
Pycgminer
=========

Python wrapper for `cgminer <https://github.com/ckolivas/cgminer>`_ RPC API.

QuickStart
----------

.. code-block:: python

    from pycgminer import CgminerAPI

    cgminer = CgminerAPI()

    summary = cgminer.summary()

    my_asic = cgminer.asc(0)
